name: MikuDOOM Z
description:
Asahina Mikuru no Daibouken (AKA MikuDOOM 2 or MikuDOOM Z) is a GZDoom/Zandronum mod pack based on the series The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya, made originally by CCIDave and ported to ZDoom by JMF Games.

This game looks like a Doom mod made by Kyon for the SOS Brigade, by Haruhi's demand. In it, you play as Mikuru Asahina, fighting to free the planet from the evil clutches of Yuki Nagato and save her one love, Itsuki Koizumi.
